senses.sense_definition: A machine or tool used to insert tufts of yarn into a base fabric, typically for making carpets or rugs.

examples.text: The industrial <w>tufter</w> can produce large rolls of carpet much faster than manual methods.
She bought a handheld electric <w>tufter</w> to start making custom rugs in her garage.

senses.sense_definition: A person who operates a machine to tuft carpets or textiles.

examples.text: An experienced <w>tufter</w> knows exactly how to adjust the yarn tension for different textures.
The factory is looking for a skilled <w>tufter</w> to join their production team.
